title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE 1
description: A striking young woman in a silver body-suit smokes in the hostel hallway. She addresses you as if you were a police officer. You may use your finger pistols for a SUGGESTION red-check. Failure gives you some forewarning about what's going on.

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Officer." The woman nods to you, s..."
dialogueTree.text: "Officer." The woman nods to you, still smoking her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Ah yes, *officer*... about that.""
links.text: "Ah yes, *officer*... about that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes, sir?""
links.text: "Yes, sir?"

links.title: You: ""How did you know I'm with the poli..."
links.text: "How did you know I'm with the police?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Unless you've been feeding us a se..."
links.text: "Unless you've been feeding us a set of well rehearsed lies, you've been here for three days. On *official police business* no less."

links.title: You: ""And what business is that?""
links.text: "And what business is that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I couldn't say. In truth... so far..."
links.text: "I couldn't say. In truth... so far, mostly drinking."

links.title: Logic: "You have no doubt about the drinkin..."
links.text: You have no doubt about the drinking, but do you strike yourself as a tight-lipped drunk? She must have heard *something*.

links.title: You: ""I might not know where I am. Or wh..."
links.text: "I might not know where I am. Or who I am. Or what a *Coupris Kineema* is; how I know what one sounds like..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She nods."
links.text: She nods.

links.title: You: ""...but I do know when someone's no..."
links.text: "...but I do know when someone's not telling me the whole story. What am I doing here? What's my case?"

links.title: You: ""That's it.""
links.text: "That's it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Good monologue!" She smiles, flash..."
links.text: "Good monologue!" She smiles, flashing her pearl-white teeth.

links.title: You: ""I might not know who I am, but I d..."
links.text: "I might not know who I am, but I do know when someone's not telling me the whole story. What am I *doing* here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""There's a mercenary out back. He's..."
links.text: "There's a mercenary out back. He's been hanged. The body has been there for a week now. The locals probably got tired of it and called the cops."

links.title: Empathy: "She speaks matter-of-factly, but th..."
links.text: She speaks matter-of-factly, but there's a sadness in her voice.

links.title: You: ""And why didn't you just tell me th..."
links.text: "And why didn't you just tell me that?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I didn't mean to overwhelm you wit..."
links.text: "I didn't mean to overwhelm you with information. You seem a bit... lost, officer."

links.title: You: ""Why don't I remember being a cop,..."
links.text: "Why don't I remember being a cop, or anything else?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I can see that.""
links.text: "I can see that."

links.title: You: ""Do you know why?""
links.text: "Do you know why?"

links.title: You: ""Good.""
links.text: "Good."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Is it?" She raises an eyebrow. The..."
links.text: "Is it?" She raises an eyebrow. The cigarette sizzles.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Could it be because of the drinkin..."
links.text: "Could it be because of the drinking?" She raises an eyebrow. The cigarette sizzles.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "She hasn't had time to put her make..."
links.text: She hasn't had time to put her make-up on -- this is her morning cigarette. She looks tired, her beauty waning faster than it ought to at her age.

links.title: You: ""Who in their right mind would let..."
links.text: "Who in their right mind would let *me* be an officer of the law?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Don't be so harsh on yourself. The..."
links.text: "Don't be so harsh on yourself. They let almost anyone be a police officer."

links.title: Authority: "A glib remark. Don't let it stand -..."
links.text: A glib remark. Don't let it stand -- assert yourself.

links.title: You: ""Actually, I can see why they would..."
links.text: "Actually, I can see why they would entrust me with the law. I have the right character."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A fondness for contradictory state..."
links.text: "A fondness for contradictory statements?"

links.title: You: ""No. In the course of our conversat..."
links.text: "No. In the course of our conversation I have masterfully suppressed the urge to throw up. This is a sign of professionalism."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Thank you, sir." She smiles, lazil..."
links.text: "Thank you, sir." She smiles, lazily. "I mean that."

links.title: You: ""No. I realized you were withholdin..."
links.text: "No. I realized you were withholding information. Something lit up in me. A killer instinct."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course." She pulls on her cigar..."
links.text: "Of course." She pulls on her cigarette.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She remains unconvinced..."
links.text: She remains unconvinced...

links.title: You: ""No. I think I saw a sadness in you..."
links.text: "No. I think I saw a sadness in you when you told me about the hanged man. Others would have missed it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""But I wasn't sad." She tilts her h..."
links.text: "But I wasn't sad." She tilts her head.

links.title: You: ""No. My mind keeps coming up with t..."
links.text: "No. My mind keeps coming up with titbits of information -- all sorts of facts, trivia. Gives me a detective-y vibe."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course." She pulls on her cigar..."
links.text: "Of course." She pulls on her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""No. I *deduced* that I'd thrown my..."
links.text: "No. I *deduced* that I'd thrown my shoe out the window from the direction of the shards."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Extraordinary." She pulls on her c..."
links.text: "Extraordinary." She pulls on her cigarette and nods.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She doesn't actually think it's all..."
links.text: She doesn't actually think it's all that extraordinary.

links.title: You: ""This is your morning cigarette. I..."
links.text: "This is your morning cigarette. I deduced this from your lack of make-up. Also -- you *party*. A lot."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Not as much as you..." She pulls o..."
links.text: "Not as much as you..." She pulls on her cigarette. "I'm sorry, sir. I didn't mean to be glib. I'm sure you're very good at your job."

links.title: You: ""Never mind. It's more likely someo..."
links.text: "Never mind. It's more likely someone made a mistake somewhere..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry. I was being glib." She..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I was being glib." She pulls on her cigarette. "I'm sure you're a great cop."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "No, she's not! Reassert yourself by..."
links.text: No, she's not! Reassert yourself by being *flirtatious*.

links.title: You: "Better let it go. Say nothing."
links.text: Better let it go. Say nothing.

links.title: Authority: "Retreat is not a winning tactic."
links.text: Retreat is not a winning tactic.

links.title: Authority: "That feels like a jab, but honestly..."
links.text: That feels like a jab, but honestly -- you deserve it. Plus, it would be *rude* to reprimand her.

links.title: You: "Try *The Expression* on her -- let..."
links.text: Try *The Expression* on her -- let her know you want her. Physically.

links.title: Suggestion: "*Try The Expression*? C'mon, why ar..."
links.text: *Try The Expression*? C'mon, why are you still doing this?

links.title: You: ""I'm at death's door, bloated, a go..."
links.text: "I'm at death's door, bloated, a goner. And still..." (Sigh.) "Does the longing ever stop?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Alcohol raises testosterone levels..."
links.text: "Alcohol raises testosterone levels, especially in men," she says matter-of-factly. "The levels remain elevated after inebriation ends and the pain begins. You seek comfort. It's only natural."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Isn't it the other way around? Heav..."
links.text: Isn't it the other way around? Heavy drinking decreases testosterone... and believe me, you would know.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She puts out her cigarette."
links.text: She puts out her cigarette.

links.title: Suggestion: "The words have already left your mo..."
links.text: The words have already left your mouth...

links.title: You: ""I want to have fuck with you.""
links.text: "I want to have fuck with you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She erupts in laughter, all the fat..."
links.text: She erupts in laughter, all the fatigue swept from her face. "What was that!? That's not even how *words* are used. What did you say? C'mon, say it again!"

links.title: You: ""I said I wanted to have sex with y..."
links.text: "I said I wanted to have sex with you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, you see, that's not what you s..."
links.text: "No, you see, that's not what you said. You said..." But she's unable to finish, consumed with laughter.

links.title: You: ""No, I don't want to.""
links.text: "No, I don't want to."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""C'mon man, pretty please! One more..."
links.text: "C'mon man, pretty please! One more time!"

links.title: Authority: "Don't back down now. Say what you s..."
links.text: Don't back down now. Say what you said again -- *proudly*.

links.title: You: ""I said *I want to have fuck with y..."
links.text: "I said *I want to have fuck with you*."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""God damn right you did, you crazy..."
links.text: "God damn right you did, you crazy asshole, you!" She wipes the tears from her eyes. "What kind of cop *are* you?"

links.title: You: ""I'm a Cop of the Apocalypse.""
links.text: "I'm a Cop of the Apocalypse."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Has the time come already?" She ra..."
links.text: "Has the time come already?" She raises an eyebrow.

links.title: You: ""Yes, we are mere minutes away from..."
links.text: "Yes, we are mere minutes away from the total collapse of reality."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Mere minutes? I should go and prep..."
links.text: "Mere minutes? I should go and prepare then. Thank you, this has been delightful. I hope it does all come crashing down. Otherwise..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Cops walking around with no memory..."
links.text: "Cops walking around with no memory of who they are, saying what I just said... The end can't be more than two days away."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're one intense cop. Anyone eve..."
links.text: "You're one intense cop. Anyone ever tell you that?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I guess I'm pretty intense.""
links.text: "Yeah, I guess I'm pretty intense."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""All right, then. Looks like I shou..."
links.text: "All right, then. Looks like I should go and prepare for what's to come. And thank you, this has been delightful. I do hope it happens *sooner*. Otherwise..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""I'm sure I'm usually less intense...."
links.text: "I'm sure I'm usually less intense. I don't know why this *stuff* is coming out of my mouth. "

links.title: You: ""I wouldn't know. I have no recolle..."
links.text: "I wouldn't know. I have no recollection of anyone ever telling me *anything*."

links.title: You: ""No, we still have some centuries t..."
links.text: "No, we still have some centuries to go."

links.title: You: ""Superstar Cop. I can no longer den..."
links.text: "Superstar Cop. I can no longer deny it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay, that's cool. Or... if I can..."
links.text: "Okay, that's cool. Or... if I can just maybe ask you to elaborate on that superstardom a tiny bit?"

links.title: You: ""It means I'm a bloated old drunk w..."
links.text: "It means I'm a bloated old drunk with sideburns and disco pants. If I don't have a joke up my sleeve -- it's on me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I have certainly been entertained...."
links.text: "I have certainly been entertained. Thank you. Whatever you are, you should stick to it. Otherwise..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""I sincerely think I'm a superstar...."
links.text: "I sincerely think I'm a superstar. It's a theory I'm developing."

links.title: You: ""I am a scion of Guillaume le Milli..."
links.text: "I am a scion of Guillaume le Million."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Or maybe you *are* Guillaume le Mi..."
links.text: "Or maybe you *are* Guillaume le Million? He'd be about your age now... Think about it! One thing, though..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry. I don't know why I said..."
links.text: "I'm sorry. I don't know why I said that. You're pretty... I'm sorry. I'm the Sorry Cop."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Don't be, it was funny. And, anywa..."
links.text: "Don't be, it was funny. And, anyway, who gives a shit? Who gives a shit about any of it?"

links.title: Empathy: "She appears to genuinely want you t..."
links.text: She appears to genuinely want you to understand it's okay.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""So what if you can't pull Grade A..."
links.text: "So what if you can't pull Grade A pussy anymore? There are other things in life -- more meaningful, more fitting for a man your age. This..." She gestures towards herself, draped in silver. "This is *fata morgana*. One thing, though..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's gonna suck for you later when..."
links.text: "It's gonna suck for you later when you have to interrogate me."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And, for the record: No, I didn't..."
links.text: "And, for the record: No, I didn't do it."

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure I'm a cop at all. I s..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I'm a cop at all. I sure don't remember being one. I think I might have lied."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay, sir, I have to ask: do you r..."
links.text: "Okay, sir, I have to ask: do you really not remember? Just like that..." She tries to think of a likelier explanation, but fails. "You drank so much you lost your memory?"

links.title: You: ""I don't think there's any more to..."
links.text: "I don't think there's any more to it. I'm a joke of a cop, or I joked about being one, and I drank too much. I'm also old."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry..." She extinguishes her..."
links.text: "I'm sorry..." She extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""No. There is a massive, otherworld..."
links.text: "No. There is a massive, otherworldly mystery afoot here. And I am at the centre of it."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""In that case, I think I might have..."
links.text: "In that case, I think I might have a *premonition* for you..." The silence is foreboding as she extinguishes her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""It's obvious. Someone did me over...."
links.text: "It's obvious. Someone did me over. I got fucked -- bad."

links.title: You: ""Find someone else to laugh at.""
links.text: "Find someone else to laugh at."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm sorry." She puts out her cigar..."
links.text: "I'm sorry." She puts out her cigarette. "I didn't mean to hurt your feelings."

links.title: You: ""I should get going now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "I should get going now." [Leave.]

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Of course." She puts out her cigar..."
links.text: "Of course." She puts out her cigarette. "Be careful, officer. They don't like the police around here."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Something stirs in you as she's abo..."
links.text: Something stirs in you as she's about to go. Must be that *killer instinct* again -- the need to ask *questions*. It's like you've said the words a million times before...

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She looks back at you, a light glin..."
links.text: She looks back at you, a light glinting off her eyes.

links.title: You: "What if I don't want to ask questio..."
links.text: What if I don't want to ask questions?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You're a cop, Harry. It is *unnatur..."
links.text: You're a cop, Harry. It is *unnatural* of you not to want to ask questions.

links.title: Volition: "You don't have to. No one is forcin..."
links.text: You don't have to. No one is forcing you to be a cop.

links.title: You: ""Wait! I have some questions before..."
links.text: "Wait! I have some questions before you go."

links.title: You: "Let the moment pass."
links.text: Let the moment pass.

links.title: You: ""Before you go I have some *questio..."
links.text: "Before you go I have some *questions* for you."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: You: ""What is it that they have against..."
links.text: "What is it that they have against the police here?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The dockworkers are pretty cocky...."
links.text: "The dockworkers are pretty cocky. They think they're police enough. At least here on the coast -- I can't say about the rest of the city."

links.title: You: ""What is this place? Where am I?""
links.text: "What is this place? Where am I?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're in a hostel, sir.""
links.text: "You're in a hostel, sir."

links.title: You: ""No -- *where* are we? Where in the..."
links.text: "No -- *where* are we? Where in the world?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""We are in Revachol.""
links.text: "We are in Revachol."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Revachol is the disgraced former ca..."
links.text: Revachol is the disgraced former capital of the world, divided into zones of control under foreign occupation -- half a century after a failed world revolution. She is central to our moment in time.

links.title: You: ""Should that mean something to me?""
links.text: "Should that mean something to me?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You sure look like you're from Rev..."
links.text: "You sure look like you're from Revachol. Revachol parties."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Her accent suggests she is not from..."
links.text: Her accent suggests she is not from around here. She's from Oranje, another part of the world.

links.title: You: ""Revachol forever.""
links.text: "Revachol forever."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""For ever and ever.""
links.text: "For ever and ever."

links.title: Shivers: "And ever and ever... Out of the cor..."
links.text: And ever and ever... Out of the corner of your eye, you see the hair on the back of your hand standing on end. It feels as though low-grade lightning is coursing through you. You must be hypersensitive from the hangover.

links.title: You: ""How about you tell me something el..."
links.text: "How about you tell me something else instead?"

links.title: You: ""Tell me what year it is.""
links.text: "Tell me what year it is."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It's '51.""
You: ""What century?""
links.text: "What century?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""The Current Century.""
links.text: "The Current Century."

links.title: You: ""And that's what? What number?""
links.text: "And that's what? What number?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Centuries don't have numbers, they..."
links.text: "Centuries don't have numbers, they have names, and this is the current one."

links.title: You: ""How many centuries have there been..."
links.text: "How many centuries have there been, then?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Civilization has existed for eight..."
links.text: "Civilization has existed for eight thousand years, sir." She grins.

links.title: You: ""What's so funny?""
links.text: "What's so funny?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You're right." Her expression turn..."
links.text: "You're right." Her expression turns serious. "There is nothing funny about civilization."

links.title: Empathy: "She hates civilization. She feels b..."
links.text: She hates civilization. She feels betrayed by it.

links.title: You: ""Okay, tell me something else.""
links.text: "Okay, tell me something else."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah?""
links.text: "Yeah?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Those words -- "tell me something e..."
links.text: Those words -- "tell me something else" -- feel like something you've said innumerable times before. Your mouth is the very shape of them.

links.title: You: ""Your room is almost next to mine...."
links.text: "Your room is almost next to mine. Did you hear anything last night?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""There was the usual ruckus." She s..."
links.text: "There was the usual ruckus." She shrugs. "Loud disco music."

links.title: You: ""Did I have any visitors?""
links.text: "Did I have any visitors?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I couldn't say -- it's impossible..."
links.text: "I couldn't say -- it's impossible to hear people speaking from over here." She nods toward Room #3.

links.title: You: ""Loud disco music?""
links.text: "Loud disco music?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Oh yes, various artists. Ostentati..."
links.text: "Oh yes, various artists. Ostentatious Orchestrations prime among them." She raises an eyebrow, waiting for the name to connect with you.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Oh, *that*. Yeah, whooh... The less..."
links.text: Oh, *that*. Yeah, whooh... The less said about OO, the better.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""OO were *huge* where I come from...."
links.text: "OO were *huge* where I come from. I was very young then, of course. Like seven. 'Life gets haaard!'" she sings, "'But we go ooooooon!'"

links.title: Rhetoric: "In that case, doesn't life get hard..."
links.text: In that case, doesn't life get hard *because* we go on?

links.title: You: ""Yeah, we go on, alright.""
links.text: "Yeah, we go on, alright."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know about that... At arou..."
links.text: "I don't know about that... At around two o'clock, the disco stopped, and there was a change of pace."

links.title: You: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A slow, sad song started playing...."
links.text: "A slow, sad song started playing. Like organ music, on repeat. That went on for quite a while. Some of the time you were yelling along to it."

links.title: You: ""Was I singing this?" (Show her the..."
links.text: "Was I singing this?" (Show her the empty case of "The Smallest Church In Saint-Sans".)

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes! There was a church in there...."
links.text: "Yes! There was a church in there. A really small church. Like the smallest, saddest church in the whole world. It was about that. And also..."

links.title: You: ""What else?""
links.text: "What else?"

links.title: You: ""What was I singing?""
links.text: "What was I singing?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That it doesn't *matter* anymore...."
links.text: "That it doesn't *matter* anymore. And that we're *alone* now. It was difficult to tell -- the song itself was very quiet and soft, but you sounded like a wounded boar, sir. It was hard to understand what you were singing on top of it."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I'm sorry."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Don't be, I was going out later an..."
links.text: "Don't be, I was going out later anyway. It didn't bother me."

links.title: You: ""When you say *wounded* do you mean..."
links.text: "When you say *wounded* do you mean that in a *cool* way? Like a *wild beast*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes. It was very cool.""
links.text: "Yes. It was very cool."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's impossible to say whether she'..."
links.text: It's impossible to say whether she's being sarcastic or really means it.

links.title: You: ""Then what happened?""
links.text: "Then what happened?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Then you started screaming and tra..."
links.text: "Then you started screaming and trashed the place."

links.title: You: ""Are you sure I wasn't being assaul..."
links.text: "Are you sure I wasn't being assaulted?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No, it didn't sound like there was..."
links.text: "No, it didn't sound like there was a fight. It sounded like someone was trashing their room."

links.title: You: ""That's so *me*. What did I do?""
links.text: "That's so *me*. What did I do?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""A window was smashed. The tape pla..."
links.text: "A window was smashed. The tape player probably -- the song stopped -- and furniture too. A real destructothon. There was screaming. Then, I think, you passed out."

links.title: You: ""Was there anything else?""
links.text: "Was there anything else?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""There was. I think you screamed th..."
links.text: "There was. I think you screamed that you... didn't want to be 'this type of animal' anymore. I may have misheard, but it was sort of memorable."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Sounds like you were in some real *..."
links.text: Sounds like you were in some real *fundamental* pain there, muscle-man.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I went out afterwards. Everything..."
links.text: "I went out afterwards. Everything was quiet by then. Around four or five." She nods. "And that was it."

links.title: You: ""Please tell me there wasn't anythi..."
links.text: "Please tell me there wasn't anything *else*."

links.title: You: ""It prides me to hear this. Tell me..."
links.text: "It prides me to hear this. Tell me there was more."

links.title: You: ""You're making this up. I would nev..."
links.text: "You're making this up. I would never behave like that."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yes." She looks at you. "Never.""
links.text: "Yes." She looks at you. "Never."

links.title: You: ""What happened then?""
links.text: "What happened then?"

links.title: You: ""I've heard enough.""
links.text: "I've heard enough."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: You: ""It mostly just gets hard, doesn't..."
links.text: "It mostly just gets hard, doesn't it?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""It would appear so. At around two..."
links.text: "It would appear so. At around two o'clock, the disco stopped, and there was a change of pace."

links.title: You: ""Maybe we should stop going on then..."
links.text: "Maybe we should stop going on then? Doesn't the 'going on' cause the 'getting harder' part?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I think you might have come to the..."
links.text: "I think you might have come to the same conclusion last night. At around two o'clock, the disco stopped, and there was a change of pace."

links.title: You: ""Tell me something else.""
links.text: "Tell me something else."

links.title: You: ""Okay. You can go now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Okay. You can go now." [Leave.]

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Glad to have been of assistance.""
links.text: "Glad to have been of assistance."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""And no, it never stops.""
links.text: "And no, it never stops."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Goodbye.""
links.text: "Goodbye."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Something stirs in you as she's abo..."
links.text: Something stirs in you as she's about to go. Call it an instinct, a need -- the need to ask *questions*. It's like you've said the words a million times before...

links.title: You: ""*Officer*? Am I military personnel?""
links.text: "*Officer*? Am I military personnel?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Uh... no." She seems perplexed by..."
links.text: "Uh... no." She seems perplexed by your question.

links.title: Authority: "There's only one solution to this...."
links.text: There's only one solution to this. You're a businessman.

links.title: You: ""Wait, I know! I'm a businessman. *..."
links.text: "Wait, I know! I'm a businessman. *Chief executive officer*, right?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The young woman shakes her head slo..."
links.text: The young woman shakes her head slowly.

links.title: Conceptualization: "*Officer* could be an artistic stat..."
links.text: *Officer* could be an artistic statement. You're already prone to those.

links.title: You: ""'Officer' is my stage name, right?..."
links.text: "'Officer' is my stage name, right? I can see myself as a middling disco artist called 'The Officer.'"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""No..." She looks you in the eye. "..."
links.text: "No..." She looks you in the eye. "You're a *police* officer, sir."

links.title: You: ""Okay... Chief technical officer?""
links.text: "Okay... Chief technical officer?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "*Officer* could be an artistic stat..."
links.text: *Officer* could be an artistic statement. A claim to *official* renown.

links.title: You: ""Then why did you call me an office..."
links.text: "Then why did you call me an officer?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Because you're a police officer, s..."
links.text: "Because you're a police officer, sir." She pulls on her cigarette.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure?""
links.text: "Are you sure?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I am, yes. Unless you've been feed..."
links.text: "I am, yes. Unless you've been feeding us a set of very well rehearsed lies all this time..." She takes another drag.

links.title: You: ""All this time?""
links.text: "All this time?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""You've been here for three days. O..."
links.text: "You've been here for three days. On *official police business*, no less."

links.title: You: ""You're shitting me!""
links.text: "You're shitting me!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I'm not. Unless *you've* been shit..."
links.text: "I'm not. Unless *you've* been shitting *us* all this time..." She takes another drag.

links.title: You: ""God damn right, I'm a policeman! A..."
links.text: "God damn right, I'm a policeman! And don't you forget it!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay, cool. I won't.""
links.text: "Okay, cool. I won't."

links.title: Empathy: "She means it. She wouldn't defy aut..."
links.text: She means it. She wouldn't defy authority, however sweaty and bloated it may look.

links.title: You: ""No need to be alarmed. I was just..."
links.text: "No need to be alarmed. I was just getting into character, you know."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay." She breathes in the silvery..."
links.text: "Okay." She breathes in the silvery smoke.

links.title: Endurance: "Whoah! Something wants to come out..."
links.text: Whoah! Something wants to come out of you -- a bit of vomit? Thankfully you keep it down, because your body does not control you.

links.title: You: ""How did you know I'm a police offi..."
links.text: "How did you know I'm a police officer?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sir, you've been here for three da..."
links.text: "Sir, you've been here for three days. On *official police business*, as you put it."

links.title: You: ""Good. Now, how did you know I was..."
links.text: "Good. Now, how did you know I was a police officer?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""First I have to ask: Are you okay,..."
links.text: "First I have to ask: Are you okay, sir?" All of a sudden, she looks genuinely concerned. "You look like you're about to throw up... Can I bring you something?"

links.title: Endurance: "She's right. Something wants to com..."
links.text: She's right. Something wants to come out -- through your mouth. But you can keep it down because your body does not control you.

links.title: You: ""I'm fine. Answer the question.""
links.text: "I'm fine. Answer the question."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sir, you've been here for three da..."
links.text: "Sir, you've been here for three days. On *official police business*, as you put it."

links.title: You: ""What kind of business?""
links.text: "What kind of business?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sir..." For a moment it looks like..."
links.text: "Sir..." For a moment it looks like you're going to blow, but you manage to keep it in. "You've been here for three days. On *official police business*, no less."

links.title: You: ""Don't worry, I'm not going to vomi..."
links.text: "Don't worry, I'm not going to vomit."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: You: ""I feel wretched. Tell me, how do y..."
links.text: "I feel wretched. Tell me, how do you know I'm with the police?"

links.title: You: ""It's a small wonder I'm able to ev..."
links.text: "It's a small wonder I'm able to even formulate this very thought. But I'll be fine. How did you know I was a cop?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She's right. Something wants to com..."
links.text: She's right. Something wants to come out through your mouth, right in front of her, right here... It makes you put your hand on your stomach and swallow.

links.title: You: "Turn your bloated face away from he..."
links.text: Turn your bloated face away from her beauty and just keep on walking. [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "The young woman raises a cigarette..."
dialogueTree.text: The young woman raises a cigarette to her lips.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Her eyes are brown and her face is..."
links.text: Her eyes are brown and her face is speckled with birthmarks. She can't be more than 28.

links.title: Conceptualization: "A silver jumpsuit falls off her lik..."
links.text: A silver jumpsuit falls off her like scale armour, sparkling. This is the sparkle of too many nights out on the city.
